author: powercode
body:
Fixes #2722 

At the end of RetrieveMatchingProcessesByProcessName,
a check is added to see if the pattern is a positive integer.
In that case an attempt is made to match it to a process id.

comments.body: It looks like this implements what I asked for, but there was agreement that the behavior is potentially dangerous and should be interactive only.

comments.author: lzybkr
comments.body:
I know I'm the one that asked for exactly the behavior you've implemented here, but the discussion in #2722 has me convinced that
* the proposed behavior is potentially dangerous
* the general mechanism of enabling parameter metadata customization (e.g. in a users profile) enables a solution to this case for folks that can live the with potentially dangerous behavior, plus it enables many more interesting scenarios.

title: Make Get-Process <id> work as well as Get-Process <name>
